DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the relative effectiveness and safety of Synergy stent compared to other drug eluting stents.
DOC.brief_title: IRIS-Synergy Cohort in the IRIS-DES Registry
DOC.criteria: Age 19 and more Intervention with Synergy stent Agreed with written informed consent form Intervention with Synergy stent and other drug eluting stent at the same time Life expectancy of 1year and under Cardiac shock
